description: Installation of two internally illuminated advertisement logo signs (4.7m x 2.5m) on upper north and south elevation of building (Advertisement Consent)
decision_conditions: Illumination must be below the limit set out in the Institute of lighting Engineer's technical note No.5 "The Brightness of illuminated advertisements"  Reason To protect the safety and amenity of the locality  in accordance with policies 4.1 and 4.10 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan "Plan for the Environment"(2004). | The proposed sign must not have an intermittent light source animation moving feature and exposed cathode tubing.  Reason: To protect the safety and amenity of the locality  in accordance with policies 4.1 and 4.10 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan "Plan for the Environment"(2004).
